artist: Hashiguchi Goyō (self-published); Carved by Takano Shichinosuke; Printed by Somekawa Kanzō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: nude seated woman, seen from back, looking over her PR shoulder; blue floral cloth over woman's lap
marks: 大正九年七月 {Taishō kunen shichigatsu} (July 1920) 五葉画 {Goyō ga} (picture by Goyō)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
text: Portrait of Kodaira Tomi 小平とみ.
title: Woman After a Bath
